repo_notes.content: This repository implements the Plinko PIR (Private Information Retrieval) scheme from ePrint 2024-318. The canonical protocol reference is docs/plinko_paper_index.json which indexes parsed paper content, regression test data location, and video resources.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: Regression test data (3.6GB Ethereum state subset) is hosted on Cloudflare R2 at s3://plinko-regression-data/ with endpoint https://c6ffe0823b48a4b7689d9b9e9045e465.r2.cloudflarestorage.com. See docs/plinko_paper_index.json for download details.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: The state-syncer/ crate contains the core Plinko implementation: iPRF (invertible PRF), Swap-or-Not PRP, binomial sampling, and hint generation. The plinko/formal/ directory contains Rocq proofs for formal verification.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: Key video resource: Alex Hoover's talk 'Plinko - Single-Server PIR with Efficient Updates via Invertible PRFs' at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=okJaBn7ZXnc
repo_notes.author: maintainer
